title: Anwar Hadid, 20, arrives at sister Bella's 23rd birthday party in NY hand in hand with Dua Lipa, 24
text:
They've only been dating for a couple of months.

But the romance between Anwar Hadid, 20, and Dua Lipa, 24, is definitely heating up.

The British singer has been on Anwar's arm this week as he helped his older sister Bella celebrate her 23rd birthday, first at a special lunch Wednesday and then again at a star-studded party on Thursday night.

Date night: Anwar Hadid arrived at his sister Bella's 23rd birthday party in New York on Thursday hand in hand with girlfriend Dua Lipa

The pair were a study in contrasts as they arrived at the bash held at Saks Fifth Avenue in Manhattan, New York.

Anwar went with a blue and red plaid coat jacket and wide-leg blue jeans cropped at the calf.

He had on a black sock with dirty white sneaker on one foot and a blue sock with distressed black sneaker on the other foot.

Dua opted for a sequinned black two-piece of jacket and mini skirt, featuring purple tassels.

She wore black tights and heels and flashed a neon manicure.

New romance: The pair, who have only been dating for a couple of months, were a study in contrasts as they arrived at the bash held at Saks Fifth Avenue in Manhattan

On trend: The British singer, 24, opted for a sequinned black two-piece of jacket and mini skirt, featuring purple tassels. She wore black tights and heels and flashed a neon manicure

Idiosyncratic: Anwar, a model like his two sisters, went with a blue and red plaid coat jacket and wide-leg blue jeans cropped at the calf along with mismatched socks and sneakers

Anwar and Dua joined his other sister Gigi, 24, and their mother Yolanda, 55, as well as several of Bella's model pals at the party.

And while their relationship is still new, it seems the couple are already getting serious.

Sources claim the pair are renting an apartment in New York so they don't have to be apart so much.

'Dua and Anwar are spending all of their time together so it just made sense for them to rent this place,' an insider told The Sun.
description: Anwar and Dua joined his other sister Gigi, 24, and their mother Yolanda, 55, as well as several of Bella's model pals at the party.
